markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Puncturing Horn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3967) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 43</row>

</column>

---

While many kashrishi never use their horns for more than cracking open hard-shelled fruits or amplifying their psychic powers, you've practiced using yours offensively. You gain a horn unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your horn is in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and has the [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.

**Special** If you have the [xyloshi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=215) heritage, your horn instead deals 1d8 piercing damage.

<title level="2">Puncturing Horn leads to...</title>
[Fighting Horn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3971)
name: Puncturing Horn
